medical_history.chief_complaint: Shortness of breath, nonproductive cough, palpitations, and intermittent nonexertional chest tightness.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began in 2010, with no dizziness, lightheadedness, or other systemic symptoms reported. Upper respiratory symptoms resolved completely within days. Six months after ICD placement, the patient experienced facial flushing and lightheadedness after a hot shower, followed by syncope.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of hypothyroidism and allergic rhinitis; taking levothyroxine and cetirizine.
medical_history.family_history: Reported a 25-year-old cousin died in an unexplained car accident; no family history of cardiovascular disease or syncope.
medical_history.social_history: Married with two children; did not work outside the home; has never smoked or used recreational drugs; drank alcohol occasionally.
